title: problem with accentuated folders
body:
### expected behaviour
after upgrade to 6.0.0a, sync should work fine between server and client and server should correctly display the folder names + i should be able to navigate the folder hierarchy

### actual behaviour
1) server is not displaying accents properly (for instance athãƒâ¨nes which should be displayed as athã¨nes, randonnãƒâ©es -> randonnã©es)
2) when i click on one of the accentuated folder, i should see its content, instead i'm redirected to the root of my owncloud directory
3) the client is not able anymore to sync these folders : csync failed to access https://domain/remote.php/webdav/mes documents/randonnãƒâ©es

### steps to reproduce
1. upgrade to 6.0.0a

### server configuration
operating system: debian 6.0.8
web server: apache2
database: mysql
php version: 5.3.3
owncloud version: 6.0.0a
updated from an older owncloud or fresh install: updated from 6.0.0
list of activated app: default
the content of config/config.php: (without the database password and passwordsalt)
$config = array (
'instanceid' => '518a8548e61ed',
'datadirectory' => '/home/owncloud/data',
'dbtype' => 'mysql',
'version' => '6.0.0.13',
'dbname' => 'clouduser',
'dbhost' => 'localhost',
'dbtableprefix' => 'oc_',
'installed' => true,
'forcessl' => true,
'loglevel' => '0',
'maintenance' => false,
'theme' => '',
}

### client configuration
operating system: windows 7

### logs
#### web server error log
nothing

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
many :
```
{"app":"php","message":"undefined index: etag at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/apps\/files\/lib\/helper.php#43","level":2,"time":"2013-12-15t21:27:23+00:00"}
```
nothing else

####owncloud client log
```
12-15 21:49:20:163 oc_module: owncloud_stat ownclouds://domain/remote.php/webdav/mes documents/randonnãƒâ©es called
12-15 21:49:20:163 csync_walker: directory: ownclouds://domain/remote.php/webdav/mes documents/randonnãƒâ©es
12-15 21:49:20:163 _csync_detect_update: ==> file: randonnãƒâ©es - hash 6664315692805057702, mtime: 1368173628, fileid: 00007524518a8548e61ed
12-15 21:49:20:163 csync_statedb_get_stat_by_hash: no result record found for phash = 6664315692805057702
12-15 21:49:20:163 _csync_detect_update: file: randonnãƒâ©es, instruction: instruction_new <<=
12-15 21:49:20:163 oc_module: opendir method called on ownclouds://domain/remote.php/webdav/mes documents/randonnãƒâ©es
12-15 21:49:20:571 oc_module: neon error code was 1
12-15 21:49:20:571 oc_module: wrn: propfind named failed with 1, request error: 404 not found
12-15 21:49:20:571 oc_module: errno set to 2
12-15 21:49:20:571 oc_module: closedir method called 056d9a70!
12-15 21:49:20:571  #### error during  csync_update :  "csync failed to access https://domain/remote.php/webdav/mes documents/randonnãƒâ©es" 
12-15 21:49:40:491 -> csync finished slot with error  true warn count 0 
```
